title: Best Of: Breakups, Bondage, & Bisexuality

description:
On today’s show, Emily is acting as your very own compass to keep you on the most pleasurable path possible – because sex is a journey – and she’s taking your emails.

She gives you all the best beginner bondage tips, advice on what to do when you start developing feelings for your best friend after a (very hot) threesome, and why texts with the opposite sex might be a downfall in your marriage.

Thank you for supporting our sponsors who help keep the show FREE: BTL Emsella, Promescent, Good Vibrations, SiriusXM, Magic Wand.

Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex talk, tips, & tricks visit sexwithemily.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
